mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV209QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(#{proStadDt},0,4)-1) AS AUD_YR ,'0' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(#{proStadDt},0,4)-1) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'기관수' AS STTC_TIT3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(#{proStadDt},0,4)-1) AS AUD_YR ,'3' AS ROW_KND_CD ,'Y' AS VIEW_YN ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(#{proStadDt},0,4)-1) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'인원' AS STTC_TIT3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL1 ,'0' AS STTC_COL2 ,'0' AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS STTC_COL4 ,'0' AS STTC_COL5 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(T2.AUD_YR) AS AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,CASE WHEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),6,2) = '12' AND T2.AUD_YR = (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(T2.AUD_YR)-2) FROM TWFAACAV200D T2 WHERE T2.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'N' WHEN T1.STTC_YR -1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_TIT3 ,TO_CHAR(NVL(STTC_COL1,0)) AS STTC_COL1 ,TO_CHAR(NVL(STTC_COL2,0)) AS STTC_COL2 ,TO_CHAR(NVL(STTC_COL3,0)) AS STTC_COL3 ,TO_CHAR(NVL(STTC_COL4,0)) AS STTC_COL4 ,TO_CHAR(NVL(STTC_COL5,0)) AS STTC_COL5 FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR NOT IN(SELECT MIN(T4.AUD_YR) FROM TWFAACAV200D T4 WHERE T4.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T4.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T5.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T5 WHERE T5.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T5.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL)) AND T2.ROW_KND_CD IN ('0','3') ORDER BY AUD_YR DESC, ROW_KND_CD

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV209QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT3 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.STTC_COL4 ,T2.STTC_COL5 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR - 2 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} AND T2.ROW_KND_CD IN ('0','3') ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV209QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'209' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -12), 0, 4) ,'01' ,'12' ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV209QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_TIT3 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,STTC_COL4 ,STTC_COL5 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '20' ,'209' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '20' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '209' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcTit3} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{sttcCol4} ,#{sttcCol5} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
